ID: CB74VTS_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Haitham Bagrain <Haitham.Bagrain@nascosaudi.com>
CC: Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com>; Furqan Akhai <Furqan.Akhai@chalhoub.com>; Saad Almaghazwi <Saad.Almaghazwi@nascosaudi.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-02 14:54
Subject: CGA Internal Statement of Account with Nasco Saudi 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Haitham,

Hope all is well.

Kindly note that our account team has rejected the payment of the attached invoice for the amount of SAR 234k as there is a significant net outstanding receivable from Nasco Saudi.

Even after accounting for the SAR 234k, there would still be a SAR 228k credit balance due to CGA from Nasco Saudi.

Please check your records, and if this is the case, use the credit balance to pay the attached invoice and keep the remaining as a credit balance to be applied toward the renewal premium.

Additionally, we need to have a meeting with the GIG team. We are doing our utmost to clear the balances, but at this point, the amounts we are due from GIG exceed what we owe them.

I suggest we organize a meeting with GIG this week to remove the block on the account and issue the policies. In parallel, we are working hard to resolve all outstanding matters with GIG.

Count on your support and cooperation from GIG on this matter.

ID: CB74VTS_01
From: Haitham Bagrain <Haitham.Bagrain@nascosaudi.com>

Dear Mr. Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

Further to below and after careful review, please note the following:

 

*         All the credit notes in the attached excel sheet are related to Medical insurance of Chalhoub Group which is with Tawuniya.

*         The credit amounts are not in NASCO bank account, actually its registered in the statement of account in Tawuniya and can be used for your next payment related to Medical insurance. 

*         For the next payment related to Medical you may advise our team to deduct the credit amount and you may transfer the remaining dues if any

*         The only amount that is related to GIG is as below which is related to Marine. Hence, we would appreciate your support to arrange for the payment to enable us to unblock the account.

Trust the above is in order. Thank you
